post.body: how much snow do you have?
having said that, I am gonna bundle up and go play in the snow for like 10 minutes!
snow it like the greatest thing in the world!
Yup! I didn't expect ANY snow today, and I got more than a foot!!
I am sorry to tell you this........but I am a COUGAR!!! HAHA you hate me now, right? Mommy said you would!
well, I hope you get like 10 more inches!!
it is still snowing here, the news says it is lighter, I see no difference
LOL is it still snowing?
yes, I think so. It is a little more than a foot tall now!
well, then I will come to you when I need help with anything like that!!
haha yes I guess so
OH YES!!! they did! Thank you for those by the way =]
thats what they say LOL
What are you talking about?
LOL HAHA yes of course I know, everyone jokes around about my height!
yyyeeeeaaaahhhhh I don't wanna be semi-popular, it is super annoying!
oh, okay! I am going to get coffee at the store!
all these random people always say hi to me because I am short!
yeah, i know
don't worry i wont!!! i am eating it!
well, whateves!!
Oh, you will definitely get some!
well, we just went outside to take snow-day pictures!!!
YESSSS the snow came ALMOST all the way up to my knee!!!
and another thing I HAVE NO SCHOOL TOMORROW!!!
well, we are back with @reighvin!!!!! YAY!!
well, i am going to the airport now...talk to you later!
whoa, its like twitter went silent!
EWW scott farted!!!
snowballs are yummy =D
LOL!!
HE FLICKED THE BOOG ON ME!!!!!!!!
HOLY MACARONI, BATMAYN!
the blue sky is coming out!!! yipee! I think we had enough snow!
mommy did not!!! LIAR!
